You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesM M] > &macr

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&macr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00af/index.htm U+000AF].
  * `&macr` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00af/index.htm U+000AF].
